host: The hostname and port of the MongoDB server (e.g., localhost:27017 or mycluster.mongodb.net). Multiple hosts should be comma-separated for replica sets, e.g., mongo1:27017,mongo2:27017.
scheme: Prefix the connection string with mongodb:// or mongodb+srv://
connectionStringOptions: Parameters appended to the connection string, e.g., retryWrites=true&w=majority&appName=default-cluster
